sentences.sContent: I am a penguin and I turn my head.
sentences.sContent_eng: I am a penguin and I turn my head.
sentences.sCn: 我是一只企鹅并且我可以摆动我的尾巴。

sentences.sContent: Lovelace: turn to the penguin next to you… and give him a great big hug!
sentences.sContent_eng: Lovelace: turn to the penguin next to you… and give him a great big hug!
sentences.sCn: 拉雷丝：转向你旁边的企鹅……然后给他一个巨大的拥抱！

phrases.pCn: 国王企鹅；帝企鹅（等于Aptenodytes patagonicus）

trans.tranOther: a large black and white Antarctic sea bird, which cannot fly but uses its wings for swimming
